body:
Comment 1: 
This seems to be because the order of evaluation of indexing and assignments are both 
undefined, and it happens that index is assigned to before array[index] (the first 
one) is evaluated.
http://golang.org/doc/go_spec.html#Order_of_evaluation
http://golang.org/doc/go_spec.html#Assignments

Since to all appearances, in normal cases, the assignments appear to be simultaneous, 
a language change making indexing operations come before assignments would probably 
be more expected.
